channel.title: Posts on Cult of Quality
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cult of Quality

item.title: Twitter for English blogging
item.description: I have started translating my posts for educational purposes. I am planning to blog in English on my Twitter: @kuznetsovdy

item.title: What has changed in your product in 5 years?
item.description: Seven years ago, I used to learn English in Lingualeo and now I have decided to do it again because of grammar training.
